DOC.brief_title: Dose Duration Metronidazole Amoxicillin Treatment Chronic Periodontitis
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial systematic review show use combination metronidazole ( MTZ ) amoxicillin ( AMX ) significantly improve benefit SRP treatment subject periodontitis . However , optimal dosage interval administration antibiotic still unclear . Therefore , aim study compare clinical microbiological outcome different dosage duration systemic administration combination MTZ AMX adjunct scale root planing ( SRP ) treatment generalize chronic periodontitis ( GChP ) . One hundred ten subject randomly assign receive SRP plus placebo , SRP combine 250 mg 400 mg MTZ , plus AMX ( 500 mg ) TID , either 7 14 day . Subjects clinically microbiologically monitor 1 year post-therapy .
